channel.title: Linux Plumbers Conference
channel.description:
This channel is managed by the Linux Plumbers Conference (LPC) committee.
The primary purpose is to host the official videos from LPC events.

item.description:

--- The Linux Plumbers Conference is the premier event for developers working at all levels of the plumbing layer and beyond. https://lpc.events/
